subtitle:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:05,000
Bē Hoan-á-hóe ê Ko͘-niû-á

2
00:00:05,000 --> 00:00:07,000
Góa sī lí ê Tâi-gí Hòng-sàng-thâu.

3
00:00:07,000 --> 00:00:10,000
Lán kin-á beh kóng ê kò͘-sū sī
"Bē Hoan-á-hóe ê Ko͘-niû-á".

4
00:00:13,000 --> 00:00:15,500
Chit ê kò͘-sū sī chiâⁿ te̍k-pia̍t,

5
00:00:15,500 --> 00:00:17,000
tān-sī neh, mā sió-khoá pi-siong.

6
00:00:17,000 --> 00:00:19,500
Khá-sú lí bô thiaⁿ-kòe ê ōe,

7
00:00:19,500 --> 00:00:22,000
lán tō chò-hóe kín lâi thiaⁿ pah.

8
00:00:28,000 --> 00:00:30,500
Chiok kú chiok kú í-chêng,

9
00:00:30,500 --> 00:00:33,000
tī chi̍t ê chiok koâⁿ, chiok koâⁿ ê tang-thiⁿ.

10
00:00:33,000 --> 00:00:36,000
Che seh sī it-ti̍t lo̍h, hong sī it-ti̍t chhoe,

11
00:00:36,000 --> 00:00:39,000
ke-á-lō͘ sī léng-léng-chheng-chheng.

12
00:00:40,000 --> 00:00:42,500
To̍h tī chit sî-chūn, tī ke-á-kak,

13
00:00:42,500 --> 00:00:45,000
ū chi̍t ê chiok khó-liân ê cha-bó͘-gín-á.

14
00:00:45,000 --> 00:00:48,000
I chhiú--ni̍h the̍h-tio̍h chi̍t nâ-á ê hoan-á-hóe.

15
00:00:48,000 --> 00:00:51,000
Tī chiah léng ê thiⁿ-khì lāi-té,

16
00:00:51,000 --> 00:00:54,000
i mā bô tì bō-á, mā bô chhēng gōa-thò.

17
00:00:54,000 --> 00:00:56,500
Sīm-chì, liân ê-á lóng bô chhēng,

18
00:00:56,500 --> 00:00:59,000
khiā tī lō͘-piⁿ, koâⁿ kah beh sí.

19
00:00:59,000 --> 00:01:03,000
Tān-sī, i mā sī chiok jīn-chin--ê,
siūⁿ-beh kā hoan-á-hóe bē--tiāu.

20
00:01:03,000 --> 00:01:07,000
In-ūi i chai-iáⁿ,
khá-sú bô kā hoan-á-hóe lóng-chóng bē--tiāu,

21
00:01:07,000 --> 00:01:10,000
in lāu-pē ē siū-khì.

22
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:12,000
Jî-chhiáⁿ, bô bē liáu,

23
00:01:12,000 --> 00:01:14,000
in lāu-pē mā bē hō͘ i tńg--khì.

24
00:01:14,000 --> 00:01:16,000
Só͘-í i to̍h hiòng múi chi̍t ê keng-kòe ê lâng

25
00:01:16,000 --> 00:01:18,000
thui-siau i ê hoan-á-hóe.

26
00:01:18,000 --> 00:01:22,000
"Hoan-á-hóe, hoan-á-hóe o͘h, lí kám beh bé hoan-á-hóe?"

27
00:01:22,000 --> 00:01:25,000
Tiō sǹg i chiok kut-la̍t teh thui-siau,

28
00:01:25,000 --> 00:01:28,000
tān-sī keng-kòe ê lâng,
lóng bô thêng--lo̍h-lâi kā i bé hoan-á-hóe.

29
00:01:29,000 --> 00:01:32,500
Sî-kan lú lâi lú oàⁿ, chit ê cha-bó͘-gín-á,

30
00:01:32,500 --> 00:01:36,000
pak-tó͘ hui-siông ê iau, sin-khu kám-kak hui-siông ê koâⁿ.

31
00:01:36,000 --> 00:01:39,000
I mā sī m̄-káⁿ tńg-khì chhù-lāi,

32
00:01:39,000 --> 00:01:42,000
in-ūi i kiaⁿ in lāu-pē ē kā mē, ē kā phah.

33
00:01:42,000 --> 00:01:45,000
Siōng-āu-bóe, i chin-chiàⁿ tòng-bē-tiâu ah,

34
00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:48,000
só͘-í i to̍h bih tī piah-kak, khai-sí tiám hoan-á-hóe.

35
00:01:49,000 --> 00:01:52,000
Tē-it ki hoan-á-hóe tiám--khí-lâi,

36
00:01:52,000 --> 00:01:55,000
i to̍h khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t lô, chiok un-loán ê hoe-lô.

37
00:01:55,000 --> 00:01:57,500
Tān-sī chiok kín--ê, hoan-á-hóe sit--khì liáu-āu,

38
00:01:57,500 --> 00:02:00,000
lô-á tō bô--khì ah.

39
00:02:00,000 --> 00:02:03,000
Sòa--loeh i to̍h tiám-khí tē-jī ki hoan-á-hóe.

40
00:02:03,000 --> 00:02:06,000
Chit pái i khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tiuⁿ chiok tōa ê toh-á.

41
00:02:06,000 --> 00:02:08,500
Toh-téng ū phang-kòng-kòng ê hang-ke,

42
00:02:08,500 --> 00:02:11,000
koh ū chiok tōa tè ê bah.

43
00:02:11,000 --> 00:02:15,000
Jî-chhiáⁿ, koh ū kî-tha chiâⁿ chē ê hó-liāu.

44
00:02:15,000 --> 00:02:17,500
Tān-sī kâng-khoán, chit ki hoan-á-hóe sio--liáu,

45
00:02:17,500 --> 00:02:20,000
it-chhè lóng siau-sit--khì ah.

46
00:02:20,000 --> 00:02:23,500
Tē-saⁿ ki hoan-á-hóe tiám--loeh,

47
00:02:23,500 --> 00:02:27,000
hóe-kong lāi-té chhut-hiān chi̍t châng
chiok tōa chiok tōa ê Sèng-tàn-chhiū.

48
00:02:27,000 --> 00:02:30,000
Sèng-tàn-chhiū thâu-téng ê tiān-hóe sī siám-siám-sih-sih,

49
00:02:30,000 --> 00:02:32,000
hui-siông ê súi.

50
00:02:32,000 --> 00:02:34,500
Tān-sī hóe chi̍t hoa--khì liáu-āu,

51
00:02:34,500 --> 00:02:37,000
hia-ê tiān-hóe tō poe-chiūⁿ-thiⁿ,
piàn-chò chi̍t lia̍p chi̍t lia̍p ê chhiⁿ.

52
00:02:38,000 --> 00:02:40,000
Siōng-āu-bóe hoan-á-hóe tiám--khí-lâi ê sî-chūn,

53
00:02:40,000 --> 00:02:42,000
sī khòaⁿ-tio̍h i siōng ài ê A-má.

54
00:02:43,000 --> 00:02:45,000
A-má phah-khui siang-chhiú,

55
00:02:45,000 --> 00:02:47,000
ná chhiò, ná kiò i kín lâi.

56
00:02:47,000 --> 00:02:51,500
Chit ê cha-bó͘-gín-á in-ūi kiaⁿ A-má siau-sit--khì,

57
00:02:51,500 --> 00:02:56,000
só͘-í hoan-á-hóe sī chi̍t ki koh chi̍t ki ê tiám--lo̍h,
kā chhun ê hoan-á-hóe lóng tiám-liáu.

58
00:02:56,000 --> 00:03:00,500
To̍h tī chiah-ê hoan-á-hóe ê hóe-kong ē-kha,
A-má kā i lám-tiâu-tiâu,

59
00:03:00,500 --> 00:03:05,000
chhoā i chò-hóe poe-chiūⁿ-thiⁿ,
khì chi̍t ê bô thiàⁿ bô pēⁿ ê só͘-chāi.

60
00:03:06,000 --> 00:03:09,500
Tē-jī kang thàu-chá, lō͘-piⁿ ê lâng
hoat-hiān-tio̍h chit ê cha-bó͘-gín-á

61
00:03:09,500 --> 00:03:13,000
khû--teh piah-piⁿ, chi̍t tāng mā bē tāng.

62
00:03:13,000 --> 00:03:16,000
I chhiú--ni̍h the̍h ê lóng sī í-keng sio--liáu ê hoan-á-hóe,

63
00:03:16,000 --> 00:03:19,000
tān-sī i ê bīn-iông khòaⁿ--khí-lâi hui-siông ê hoaⁿ-hí.

64
00:03:19,000 --> 00:03:22,000
Ná-chhiūⁿ sī teh chò chi̍t ê chiok hó ê bī-bāng.

65
00:03:22,000 --> 00:03:26,500
Sui-jiân i khì hō͘ lâng hoat-hiān ê sî-chūn í-keng kòe-óng ah,

66
00:03:26,500 --> 00:03:30,000
tān-sī i ê lêng-hûn í-keng kap A-má chhiú khan chhiú,

67
00:03:30,000 --> 00:03:33,000
khì chi̍t ê éng-oán lóng chiok un-loán,
éng-oán lóng chiok khoài-lo̍k ê só͘-chāi.

68
00:03:33,000 --> 00:03:36,000
Kok-ūi thiaⁿ-chiòng, kin-á ê kò͘-sū kóng kah chia,

69
00:03:36,000 --> 00:03:39,000
lí kám ē kám-kak ū chi̍t-koá sim-sng-sng?

70
00:03:40,000 --> 00:03:44,000
Tâi-gí Sió Kàu-sek.

71
00:03:44,000 --> 00:03:47,000
Kin-á Tâi-gí Sió Kàu-sek,

72
00:03:47,000 --> 00:03:50,000
tē-it ê beh kap tāi-ke kóng--ê sī, "Hoan-á-hóe".

73
00:03:50,000 --> 00:03:53,000
"Hoan-á-hóe", tō sī lán kóng ê huǒchái.

74
00:03:53,000 --> 00:03:56,000
Nā lán chit-má siông ēng ê dǎhuǒjī beh án-chóaⁿ kóng neh?

75
00:03:56,000 --> 00:04:00,000
Thong-siông lán ē kóng "lài-tà", tān-sī ah, ài chù-ì,

76
00:04:00,000 --> 00:04:04,000
chit ê "lài-tà" kî-si̍t sī Ji̍t-bûn,
nā Tâi-gí chí-sī iân-iōng i jî-í.

77
00:04:05,000 --> 00:04:07,500
Chit-má ê lâng lóng bô teh ēng hoan-á-hóe ah,

78
00:04:07,500 --> 00:04:10,000
lóng-chóng sī ēng "lài-tà" teh tiám-hóe.

79
00:04:11,000 --> 00:04:18,000
Ì-sù sī kóng ah

80
00:04:18,000 --> 00:04:21,500
Í-siōng to̍h sī kin-á só͘-ū ê loē-iông,

81
00:04:21,500 --> 00:04:25,000
ǹg-bāng tāi-ke ē kah-ì.
